output.name: Berserker
output.description: Premium card: Fear him. Your last breath is now.

output.name: Warden
output.description: Premium card: You shall not pass, you shall not prevail, you shall perish.

output.name: The Ripper
output.description: Premium card: Ravished by the winds of hell, no soul is to be forgiven.

output.name: Warden
output.description: Standard card: He has seen everything, his mind has never been asleep since the making of the realm.

output.name: Disciple
output.description: Standard card: Everything is sacred to him, all is but a gift from the saints.

output.description: Standard card: The days are cold and so are we. We hope we can close our eyes again.

output.name: Disciple
output.description: Premium card: The will of Gods has been spoken, obey and you shall be saved...or not.

output.name: Sentinel
